p: Because numbers of captures have increased in recent years, the linear regressions used to calculate long‐term rates of change in mean body mass could be disproportionately affected by trends in recent years. However, analysis of long‐term rates of change of mean body mass using only the mean masses in each January rather than all the individual captures during January suggests that the decline was not a purely recent event. The relevant graph for juvenile blue tits is shown in Figure 4.
